website_summaries.verdict: Includes wireless remote start option, which is a nice convenience while you're camping.
pros: Reasonable price point for 3,500W of portable power
on a tank of gas at 50% load, which is a good performance level

customer_reviews.title: Everything You Need
customer_reviews.text: I did my research before purchasing this, and I have to say that this lived up to all of my expectations. This was my first ever generator and I'm no expert by any means. Basically I wanted to be able to power my refrigerator, an electric heater, lights and a TV, and I wanted to be able to turn the thing on without going outside. AND I wanted to be able to move it around easily (meaning it had to have wheels). This served all of my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Dobbin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for camping and easy for my wife to use
customer_reviews.text: I did a TON of research before buying this unit. Electric start and remote control you cant compete. Awesome for camping and easy for my wife to use! Great power, never had a problem running A/C with Coffee or Crock Pot running. Cant beat the price point, Would buy again! Con: Not the quietest on the market but we don't use it in a campground setting. We take it with us to the race track where everyone is running a genny or just set it on the back side of camper.
customer_reviews.author: LARZ

customer_reviews.title: Yes, I recommend this product to anyone in need of a machine that delivers on its advertisement.
customer_reviews.text: This generator arrived as advertised. I did research prior to placing my order. My requirements are easily met by this generator. Its economy factor is great which was of concern as well as its weight to performance ratio. I am however disappointed that it does not come with a weather proof cover or at least offer information toward ordering the appropriate size. A cover of the correct size eludes me in my searches. Being an electrical engineer, recommending this generator comes without any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel trailer
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my travel trailer to be able to run 13,500 btu roof mounted AC. It works flawlessly. Quiet enough to meet federal RV park requirements. Great value. Remote start works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not a good option at elevation.
customer_reviews.text: This generator is as described by most. It starts right up and at 1000 ft above sea level is able to power up everything in my rv (ac,micro,light,tv,lights,and radio). However, it will struggle at 7000 ft and would not run at a high enough voltage to run the ac or microwave. I know that it was reported to be loud but when your camping neighbor from two spots over comes over and asks if it's going to be that loud all the time it may be louder than advertised. I am already looking into other options.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tough and Hardy generator remote start is worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have had this generator for 3 years now And have had no problems at all, I have put many many hours On this thing it runs my 30 ft R V literally like a CHAMPION! I can run the air conditioning and a microwave at the same time The only thing that I have noticed is that you have to have the generator warm before you start the air conditioning to take the load after that it's awesome. I purchased this generator for the remote start this is by far worth it!!! Having a little bigger generator that is a bit louder and heavier Is not a big deal when you Can just push a button👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Kayson K

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied overall
customer_reviews.text: Was purchasing for TV trip this weekend. Box arrived banged up. Manual says it will hold 3.8 gallons safely. I filled it up from empty at 2.5 gallons. When I called to inquire was told to just shake the machine. This generator is very loud. Customer service was not the best service agents were snip on the phone. Manual was not very thorough either.
customer_reviews.author: Heartdad

customer_reviews.title: Beat expectations
customer_reviews.text: The remote start is wonderful! Placed 40’ away from camp trailer (me inside) it started and turned off every time with one click of the remote. As far as noise, it is louder than a Honda. However, standing next to it with it running, I could carry a conversation with my son without raising our voices. It also ran for 8 hours on a full tank. Drawbacks would be weight and width (with tires on) As far as power output, under a heavy load, it will lug down briefly but pick right back up. Also should be noted that at 7K in elevation where I hunt, it had zero issues running.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these units in the Spring and liked it so well I recently bought a second one. Have a split level home so can use one upstairs and one downstairs when without power. Installed a pass through plug so generator can run outside the house (but under porch cover) and that really reduces the noise level, which wasn't bad to begin with. It is easy to start: has electric starter plus a start/stop remote. Don't have to go out in the cold to control it. Minimal assembly required. First one arrived with broken plastic air filter cover. Called their customer service and they shipped me a new one immediately! Highly recommend it .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The gas gauge is deceiving what looks like the half way mark is actually the full mark
customer_reviews.text: Cons: It certainly seems as if I got a used generator. There were scuff marks on the bottom, the dipstick for the oil had oil on it before we even put oil in for the first time. The manual says it is a 3.8 gal and it runs for 12 hrs. It takes about two gal and runs for 7 hrs. The gas gauge is deceiving what looks like the half way mark is actually the full mark. I live in the US Virgin Islands would be a waste of time and money to return. Pros: Runs fairly quiet, love the remote control start and stop (awesome!)
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: Generator works good and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Generator works good and looks good. The key start works. The electric choke leaves a little to be desired; you have to hold the start button for about 3 minutes to get it to start cold. It is also one of the loudest generators I've ever heard so bring a dropcord and get it as far away from your RV as possible.
customer_reviews.author: david moye

customer_reviews.title: Working great so far
customer_reviews.text: It runs for and average of 12 to 15 hrs. a week. Always starts, never had a problem. I've been using generators of this size and larger for 43 yrs. This one works great, unlike other brands that gave trouble after a few weeks, Generac for one
customer_reviews.author: Mel B

customer_reviews.title: Remote start is AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: 15 min. Out of the box and it's up and running flawlessly. Quiet, easy to use, easy on fuel, runs the A/C in our 5th wheel without a hitch. Everyone with a rv, 5th wheel, travel trailer needs one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Huckabee

customer_reviews.title: So far won't Electric or Remote start
customer_reviews.text: So I have had this generator for 2 weeks now and although it runs fantastic when I manually start it, I cannot get it to start either remotely and electrically. I have had a battery sent out and still won't do it. The customer service although sort of helpful act like it is an inconvenience to talk to me. I am hopeful that I can get these issues resolved as I like the generator overall but I really feel like right now this is not a good experience.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Scott

customer_reviews.title: This is a great generator with very good fuel economy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great generator with very good fuel economy. I used it to power my travel trailer with the A/C running full time for about 48 hours and used a little over 15 gallons. the only complaint I have is that FedEx doesn't understand what 'This end up" means and battery acid leaked inside the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Wise Guy

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and easy to run.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to operate. Good instructions. I did tons of research before buying. My husband was super impressed. He uses these all the time in his business and will be buying this again when he needs another. This one is for our home he would need a larger one for his business. We were impressed with how much quieter this one was and the remote start is a plus as even this mechanically challenged female could start it when he is not home.
customer_reviews.author: Smiles8769

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and dependable.
customer_reviews.text: Had a prolonged power outage here in Northern California. This was my first time using this generator as my husband usually does this kind of stuff. I had no problem starting it, just couldn’t find the choke right off. I found it easy to maneuver with the handle and wheels. No longer will I panic at the thought of no electricity. As they say Easy Peazy. I highly recommend this unit and it was great on fuel consumption.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Bought as backup plan to power outages and so far haven't had to use it for this. The noise level is doable. I run it once a week to keep the battery at optimum level for starting. It is fuel efficient. So far I am happy with my purchase. It will run what I need to run during power outage and the price was right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Damaged unit
customer_reviews.text: Just received my order and pull it out of the box to find it has a bent cage. Not a huge issue if I wasn’t planning on installing the tires to wheel it around, which I am. Not real sure what steps to take on getting this fixed. Try straightening it myself or contact amazon or champion to get it resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Ron C

customer_reviews.title: More power to you!
customer_reviews.text: More storms, more power outages, more generators bought. This is a nice unit. Yeah, not super quiet, but who really cares when you need power. I wouldn't take it camping, but for home use when the power goes out? This is great. Electric start makes it really useful to start and stop from the inside of your home. Works great. Has all the features you need. Low oil shutoff, voltage meter, etc. Fairly heavy, but the wheels make it easily transportable. Overall, good unit for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mindless

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We use this generator for our weekend camping trips. Works great! We can run our a/c and lights with no problem. Starts almost always on the first pull. The only thing I would add is wheels, which we actually just ordered yesterday! Pretty lightweight but would be easier with the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: sandra m.

customer_reviews.title: Battery dead after a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: It works well in the beginning. After not using it for 2 weeks, the battery is dead, and I manually started the generator and keep it running for 3 hours. I expect the battery will be recharged, but the battery is still dead. Now seems I have to manually start it every time. Or, perhaps the battery is broken?
customer_reviews.author: Shaofeng Liu

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Machine
customer_reviews.text: The generator was delivered on time and is exactly what we need. Just would like to say the company might want to use another delivery service. UPS delivered the generator to the wrong address next door even though the mailing label was on top of the box and had the correct address. The box was torn up and the air box cover cap was cracked and broken would like a replacement cap. The machine has a dent in it. But still works and we can live with a little dent. Overall very happy with the machine itself and timely delivery 2 days is amazing. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Fezzolare

customer_reviews.title: Better than my Honda
customer_reviews.text: This unit has twice the power of my Honda, costs half as much and runs twice as long. UPS delivered it with the box upside down and the oil dip stick was broken. I contacted Champion, and they sent a new one the same day.
customer_reviews.author: RosieAndMe

customer_reviews.title: it is easy to start
customer_reviews.text: its a good generator with lots of starting options (button, remote and pull cord) and it handles load very well , it is not a quiet as I wanted it to be , I used it on an ice cream truck and it carries three small deep freezers and one counter top drink cooler with no problem
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Named earned..Champion!
customer_reviews.text: Name earned.. Champion Wedding power source..tent 40x40 with string lights and large chandelier as well as DJ power for two 15" powered speakers. Noise level not a problem with generator placed 10 to 15 feet from tent.
customer_reviews.author: Cuber

customer_reviews.title: Great features at a great price and seems well made
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my Dad. He has arthritis and cannot start a "pull rope" generator. This one has remote start, auto choke and it even switches off the load first when starting and then attaches the load once the engine is up to speed. Those are amazing features for a generator in this price range and it started on the 1st remote button press! My Dad loves this generator. My Dad commented that this one is quieter than some other generators he has been around, so it has a good muffler on it too.
customer_reviews.author: P. W. M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy start-Remote is awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Champion Remote start generator. The old one lasted about 10 years and work great right up till the end. The customer service for Champion is great. Bought the 2nd one because of the dependability and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: SADIE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after reading the reviews here on Amazon and other sites. It arrived 3 days before it was scheduled to, so that was a pleasant surprise. Opened the box and saw a very nice looking, in perfectly new condition, Champion generator. The set up instructions and process were clear and easy. The generator fired right up. It was nicely quiet and ran smoothly. I am happy with this so far. I will use it on my first camping trip in a couple of weeks and will be back to give my review of that experience. I expect it to go well. To this point, I'd recommend this generator.
customer_reviews.author: JSMKGA

customer_reviews.title: but it was easy to start using the remote start and to shut ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only run it long enough to do the first oil change, but it was easy to start using the remote start and to shut off. It all worked and ran perfectly during the 4-hour trial run. Pretty quiet (quieter than others I've heard). Running just outside the open garage door I did not hear it in the house.
customer_reviews.author: wbspfd

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I like this generator alot. For the price it runs everything I need for my 27ft camper. The rv ready plug is great. Easy to start and very fuel efficient compared to others I've had. For its size it is easy to move with the wheel kit it comes with, but is very heavy if you have to lift it. It could be quieter but honestly didn't notice it while in the camper with it only 5 ft away. The remote start in the mornings is great especially when its raining. Great buy very happy.
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: Not working from the start
customer_reviews.text: Bought this generator almost one year ago. USED ONCE, FOR ONE HOUR! Battery was dead from the beginning. Charged the battery and still would not start. Had to use the pull cord. Tried to use one year later, same problem. The unit gallops. Contact the company's customer service and they suggested I purchase a new battery and use dirty gas, which is not true. The warranty is useless. Would return back to Amazon if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Remote start :) AWESOME.
customer_reviews.text: First off, remote start kicks butt! Nothing like laying in the camper and "hmm im a bit chilly" push the button and it kicks right in... And the heated matress gets all cozy. Yeh, it's not a clean sine wave but the electronics on the camper are 12v off an inverter anyway so it doesn't matter. It's kinda noisy. Point the muffler away from ya and its tolerable. Might add another muffler in the future. Did is mention remote start.....
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great Generator but the Amazon Price has gone up over $800 form 2018!@!@!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this exact Model 2 years ago - like all Amazon Goods & Services the price increases have been crazy - 100x more inflation. Buy from Walmart!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Champion generator
customer_reviews.text: So far so good...attaching wheels, handle, center support, battery, battery cables all done w ease. Filled w oil and gas. Turn on battery, run switch and fuel petcock. Used remote to start unit and it fired off on first try. I then hooked up a small deep fryer rated at 1500 watts tops and small space heater rated at 1000 watts tops. Cycled them both from low to high and unit kept step w loads perfectly. Breaking it though w/o loads 1 hour at a time for 4 hours or until fuel runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Salsegevevitan

customer_reviews.title: Gas Guzzler.
customer_reviews.text: Love the remote start but it is a lot noisier than the Honda generator we have. We bought this one because of the remote start and the fact that the cold mornings during hunting season means we won’t have to open the door to the travel trailer to pull start the generator for our morning coffee. This will also will run the a/c in the trailer. It’s made in China so I hope it lasts longer than the warranty period.
customer_reviews.author: Nevada Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Long life and easy start
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the little Champion generators for years as a backup to my off grid solar and to run item that wouldn't be practical to run off the solar. Now with the addition of electric and remote start life is even easier. As I said I've used these generators for years, but have never had an engine or generator failure
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Wishing everyone in this area no more hurricanes but just in case buy this Champion it's worth it not to worry.
customer_reviews.text: Received from seller in 3 days and no damage. Is a very nice looking machine and the wheels and handle make it very easy to handle. Registering is very easy and customer service was extremely easy to work with. Easy to start and fill.
customer_reviews.author: 904 Linda

customer_reviews.title: There generator is JUNK.
customer_reviews.text: Never got it running Eengine lovked up. Disonnected low oil level shut off as they suggested and engine still locked up. They said to remove manual start. Im 85 yrs old and not a generator mechanic. It should have run when removed from box. Iit has oil & gas in it and battery connected. I haven heard anything further from them. The generator is sitting in my garage. I Have Purchased another generator started immediately out of the box and I am wellpleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: allan gluth

customer_reviews.title: 7 years and running strong!
customer_reviews.text: We use this in the mountains to power our trailer. It will run the a/c and whatever else we need. It's great to just push the button to turn it on or off. You don't have to go out at night to turn the generator off. We turn the switch off at the generator to save the battery just before we're ready to leave the mountains. It doesn't run the battery down leaving it on (only running part of that time) for several days. It's relatively quiet. Sitting only four feet from the trailer, we can carry on a normal conversation easily. SEVEN YEARS LATER AND IT'S STILL RUNNING STRONG -- 2020!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Champion generator
customer_reviews.text: Very good generator,only problem is starter solenoid went bad twice and negated remote start but champion replaced it with no problem,would buy again. This is 2nd one I've bought.
customer_reviews.author: michael h watkins

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Love the remote start
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely heavy and loud, but for the price and remote start it is a great deal. We use it mainly for dry camping in our 30 ft trailer. Have used smaller Honda generators a great for other times when we need something portable and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: JDA

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: Remote start is awesome. First time out in the camp trailer was in rain and snow. Was great to start/stop it from inside the trailer. Plent of power to run everything and charge battery. Need a ramp to roll it up in truck.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great generator! The key fob is handy for starting up from inside the camper late at night. Seems very fuel efficient. Runs all night without having to gas up with running the A/C in the camper. Quieter than you'd expect. I would recommend this generator to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this generator more than my other small generators. 99% of the time it starts on the first try. Has three ways to start. Pull cord, push button or remote start. RV/5th wheel ready. Great value for the money and easy to move around. I use this often for camping, welding, power in areas where not available, etc... I not only would by another if and when needed but I would recommend this to friends and family (who also borrow frequently).
customer_reviews.author: Jeep TX Tom

customer_reviews.title: Champion 4,000 watt, Wireless Remote start
customer_reviews.text: Shipped perfect....runs perfect...starts right away...very pleased with my purchase. Paid 469.00 or there abouts with free shipping!Just what I needed in case of power failure for my FINISHED basement SUMP PUMP / fridge / lights/ computer / TV. You cannot buy this at big box stores for this price; besides you would have to get in the car and go shopping which I hate to do. Amazon rocks and it won't be long before CT tax will be added...(Nov. 2013) so get it now North Easters. If your looking for a generator that WILL NOT hook into the breaker panel this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Better than advertised
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box it took me about 30 minutes to put it together. Good, easy to follow instructions and easy to assemble. Poured a little gas in the tank and she fired right off. I would make one recommendation, the guide on the outside of the box is a reference guide and should be printed on a separate paper for easy reference long after the box is gone. I would definitely recommend this generator to anyone wanting an easy to use generator.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: First summer worked great. This year won't start with remote
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I would not have to get out of my RV to start generator. First summer worked great. This year won't start with remote. I could have bought the basic model if I wanted to go out and pull start it! Just buy the 299 version. Don't waste your money on remote version...It will fail!
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Generator
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality, well built generator. After filling the oil and gas, it started on the first try. Runs quietly and very efficient!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Grigsby

customer_reviews.title: Love the remote start
customer_reviews.text: I have another generator that is smaller, but I love this one because of the remote start. I can start and stop it from inside the trailer. Saves trips in and out at night or bad weather. Will power the air conditioner, but not much else or it can't keep up. Without the air conditioner, it has no problem running the microwave and other electric systems including an electric coffee pot.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: great generator
customer_reviews.text: love the battery start however you must be diligent in keeping the battery charged.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Works like a.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a.... well a champ. LOL the Remote start is worth the few extra bucks. Took it camping with me over new years in the desert... in the mornings it was about 18*.... it took a couple tries to fire off, but it did... and I didn't have to get out of the trailer to do it... so I stayed nice and warm!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Bootsma

customer_reviews.title: Hard working, and great features
customer_reviews.text: I use this generator for my detail business and it works great. Plenty of power to run tools and buffers. They key fob switch saves me tons of fuel and works very well. Be sure to have a battery if you will be storing this for long periods.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew parker

customer_reviews.title: You will appreciate this unit
customer_reviews.text: Have used the pull start model for years and wanted to upgrade and its worth every penny. This unit will still pullstart if the battery is dead. Couldn't be happier with champion generators.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love the remote start.
customer_reviews.text: We frequently camp where power is not available. The remote start feature is great. When the batteries are getting low on the camper just push the remote start button and you have instant power. Nice to not have to go out of the camper on those rainy days or in the middle of the night to start the generator.
customer_reviews.author: Bill S.

customer_reviews.title: Remote start function
customer_reviews.text: The generator runs great, silence is a plus, but just like the last one I bought a few years ago, the remote start has quit working within 3 months of purchase. I don’t use the generator too often, only to charge my battery bank when solar panels don’t quite meet my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Melville

customer_reviews.title: Battery bad wont charge up,
customer_reviews.text: Had it in my garage since last december , and now wont start . Going to buy new battery!
customer_reviews.author: Bep

customer_reviews.title: the end housing support is aluminum, broken in 1 year
customer_reviews.text: the end housing support is aluminum, broken in 1 year
customer_reviews.author: Qing Mu

customer_reviews.title: seller is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Although my first review was harsh this company really took care of me! This generator didn’t work properly and the company made it right and then some. I don’trecommend this particular generator buti absolutely recommend this seller. They know how to take care of their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Leone

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Great portable generator.. works like a champ... (no pun intended!)
customer_reviews.author: C William Renfroe Sr

customer_reviews.title: generator
customer_reviews.text: a little loud but it gives me the power that I need
customer_reviews.author: kevin herman

customer_reviews.title: Great generator for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great generator. Got it just in time for Hurricane Irma and as expected lost power and had to put it to use. The unit is very easy to use and not too loud.
customer_reviews.author: JO-ANN LEWIS

customer_reviews.title: My Review
customer_reviews.text: It's absolutely fine. I loved it. Quiet and reliable, if you remember to run it dry before storage. Not hard on fuel and among the cleanest.
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: Dead battery
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. The battery is no good, so the remote start will not work.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schuler

customer_reviews.title: It works but would not use for camper
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked perfect and ran every thing on my 27 foot toyhauler.. but it is way louder than expected. I ended up going to a more quiet inverter style generator for the camper and use this for other things.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Works great. We got it just in time before the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. We got it just in time before the hurricane hit us a couple of weeks ago. It's nice to have it when you need it. Some people were trying to buy one a day after, because living with no power is not nice.
customer_reviews.author: loranee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's an awesome generator, easy to use and does not take up much space. Love the remote control.
customer_reviews.author: Sadysue

customer_reviews.title: Pretty quiet. Not silent but you can have a ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty quiet. Not silent but you can have a conversation over the sound. Having it on wheels is great and the handle is ok, but the grip needs some glue to keep it on. You certainly wouldn't want to pull it too far. The remote is very handy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Summary "read it"
customer_reviews.text: 2.7 gallons of gas, use all the oil it comes with that is the exact ammount needed upon setup, 5 minutes to unpack and setup wheels and handles. Easy out of the box. Make sure you let it warm up then gradually apply load. Remote start worked perfectly on first start. 10 stars great product and great price. I would say it's got noise but you could still talk to another person standing beside it easily without raising your voice. Generators are great if you know how to use them properly. Buy a 3k$$ gen and don't use it right you will damage it or your appliances quicker than you clicked buy.
customer_reviews.author: TheHonestGuy

customer_reviews.title: Remote start rocks
customer_reviews.text: Remote works 80+ft from generator with clear line of sight No problems so far Noise is normal for its size
customer_reviews.author: Justin Lowery

customer_reviews.title: I would buy another one in a second
customer_reviews.text: This generator is the best. It was so simple to put together, and the instructions are super clear. It started with the push of a button the very first time, and I've tested it with my refrigerator with no problems. It's a little more expensive than other options, but the peace of mind and ease of use make it worth it.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Better than I anticipated, quiet for the performance.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to start, and assemble. Heavy. Good value. Not too loud.
customer_reviews.author: #1 Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great generator at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great generator for the price! I use it for dry camping out at the sand dunes and it runs great, fires up easy, and most of all the remote start is a huge plus when it’s cold in the morning and I want to charge my trailer batteries and run the microwave!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Fine piece of equipment in form, fit and finish. Simple do it yourself assembly.
customer_reviews.text: I compared the selection of Amazon advertised generators and found the Champion the best suited for my needs. Simple assembly and I was glad to see a gell cell battery, but wonder what the temperature extremes that battery can take with the harsh Maine winters. I was also glad to see a pull start capability with this generator in the event of battery loss. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Harry McDiarmid

customer_reviews.title: Expectations met!
customer_reviews.text: The generator arrived in good time, in a flimsy cardboard box, but the packing material kept anything from being damaged. Easy to assemble with good instructions provided. Started with the battery on the first try. Tested out properly for my purposes--sump pump, t.v., lights, refrigerator, etc. Too early to know how it will perform with a few hours usage. Should be a follow-up review in 6 months, or so. Great product otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Dutchman

customer_reviews.title: Well built and starts on first time.
customer_reviews.text: Not hard to set up and instructions are clear and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: DONALD PRILL

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the looks, runs quieter than expected and, remote control is wonderful. Haven't got to use it yet so can't really talk about quality performance. I got this in case of power outage. I am medically challenged and have a bunch of medical equipment that I must keep operating. Hoping this is as good as previous reviews indicate.
customer_reviews.author: pitcruchief

customer_reviews.title: It does not like sub-freezing temperatures
customer_reviews.text: Otherwise, a decent unit. It has an automatic choke which is basicly dysfunctional. A manual choke override would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Jackster

customer_reviews.title: made to cheaply ,
customer_reviews.text: the air filter was broke when I got it , the remote has never worked , the pull cord has already broke , I have owned tools for years and never had to replace a pull cord , had this generator for less than 6 months .
customer_reviews.author: Steve McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Needed item
customer_reviews.text: A tremendous item for the hurricane season. Used to run portable A/C during power outage.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 4 stars because it is very loud, but it works just fine. I love that I can turn it off and on with remote and not have to go out in bad weather to turn on. When not using be sure to turn off battery as it will run down. In very cold weather it will take a couple of try's before it will start.
customer_reviews.author: Kim's Connection Photography

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic generator at an affordable price. Just make sure to change the oil after the first 5 hours and perhaps once more before the regular scheduled changes. Great remote start feature although the generator is too far from our house to use it. Provides lots of power
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Devine

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy to assemble. Worked great on our first camping trip and you can't beat the automatic starter. Beats getting out in the cold to start up the trailer to get your coffe going. So far seems to handle a normal load from the trailer.
customer_reviews.author: DesertLivin

customer_reviews.title: Reliable product. Would recommend and purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Currently using this model generator to power 2 1500w space heaters, house lamp, and charging cell phones during blizzard Jonas. Made this purchase after Sandy when we lost power for a day and a half and were stranded. Wife thought I was crazy. Now she's thanking me for my preparedness. Runs well in 17 degree weather! Contemplating buying a second to run a few more space heaters and/or appliances depending on time of year.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Packed well and easy assembly. Easy starting with electric start. Handled two refrigerators and my tankless water heater with no problems during the Edison power outages. Thought highly enough of Champion that I just purchased their 12000 watt generator.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this the day before the New England Blizzard this winter. I ordered with overnight shipping unfortunately it did not arrive on time, I considered returning it but that was not an option. Used it a few times powering tools around the yard and once powering a few heaters during a short outage. Used the provided oil during a breakin period then changed to royal purple.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: I love mine! I had a similar one and it was stolen so i replaced it with this one and i have had one issue 1. Missing a bolt on battery , which compant sent me. It needed to have the carburator cleaned right after I first used it which I thought was weird but it has been humming ever since. It runs my little travel trailer and some tools at the same time, good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: CINDY CARLSON-DAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my inlaws as we lose power 2-3 times a year due to rain/weather. Started right up and was easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is worth more than I paid.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great with the remote start. instant startup with good voltage. Note just 120, No 220
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Love the remote access!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome generator! It was easy to put together and came with just enough oil to fill it up. The key fob was a great feature and has about a 5 second delay with the generator. The first start took a while, but after that it was 5 second delay. Love this generator!
customer_reviews.author: S. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable with bad customer support
customer_reviews.text: Unreliable with bad customer support. The auto-start button ceased to function pretty quickly. Champion tech support sent us a replacement switch and control box, which failed to fix the problem. We were told by Champion at that point to take it to Camping World for repairs. Our local Camping World does not have a technician that can work on these things. Now the generator is leaking oil into the air intake, fouling the filter whenever it is used. It will not even pull-start now. Champion is no longer responding to our emails and requests for support. We will begin investigating Small Claims Court next. Short version: Champion sold us a bad product and refuses to correct it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Champion Power Equipment Gen. 46539
customer_reviews.text: The Champion Power Equipment 46539 4,000 Watt 196cc 4-Stroke Gas Powered Portable Generator With Wireless Remote Electric Start (CARB Compliant) was a good buy. Found the best price here on Amazon which included free shipping to my home. The package arrived undamaged. Required a little amount of work to put the wheels on, pull handle, adding the oil the came with the gen and finally hooking up the battery cables. So after filling the gas take the generator started right up. Both the wireless and side mounted start button worked good. The pull handle is mounted to close to the muffler though. Overall it was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Guod

customer_reviews.title: what a kick ass gen for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: i put it in a off grid cabin and i love that remote start!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Thrasher

customer_reviews.title: Well built easy assy. and quick start did not try on ...
customer_reviews.text: Well built easy assy. and quick start did not try on air conditioner yet. It is all that it claims to be and more.
customer_reviews.author: David Dario

customer_reviews.title: Good little machine
customer_reviews.text: Good little machine. For price is great I bought for in-laws during Irma. There lot older so push button is great for them ...
customer_reviews.author: David Bannon

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: Love the battery start feature. It runs great and puts out the power I need. Seems well built and rugged enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Great generator! I wish it were a little smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: Great generator! I wish it were a little smaller but that's just me being picky. I LOVE the remote start!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a weekend camping trip
customer_reviews.text: Really love this generator and the remote start. Perfect to keep the AC running while camping.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamen Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed!
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention: This unit does not have a 220 volt outlet! Other than that it's incredible! Well constructed and reasonably quiet.
customer_reviews.author: hotshot

customer_reviews.title: It still starts right up and runs great, (with a new battery every year)
customer_reviews.text: Have had this generator since June of 2011. It still starts right up and runs great, (with a new battery every year). Its not as quiet as the really high dollar generators but we were presently surprised that it was not as noisy as we were expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Champion 3500-Watt RV Ready Portable Generator with Wireless Remote Start (CARB)
product_meta.description: Champion Power Equipment makes powering your life easier than ever with the 46539 3500-Watt RV Ready Portable Generator with Wireless Remote Start. With enough power for two 15,000 BTU RV air conditioners, you can also use this feature-packed generator to power the essentials in your home the next time there’s an outage. For projects, the 196cc Champion single-cylinder OHV engine has what it takes to handle the power tools you need. Champion’s got convenience covered. Starting and stopping your generator from up to 80 feet away with the wireless remote key fob is a snap. Enjoy on/off push-button power with electric start, battery included, plus Cold Start Technology ensures a quick start in cold weather. Champion’s Intelligauge monitors voltage, frequency and operating hours. The foldaway easy-grip handle and included wheel kit with never-flat tires make it a cinch to move your power where you need it. At 4000 starting watts and 3500 running watts, this unit can handle your essentials during an outage, plus it’s the perfect companion for your next camping trip or weekend project. Not only that, but the Volt Guard built-in surge protector prevents overloads and keeps your equipment safe from spikes in voltage. This unit has the outlets you need, including a 120V 30A (TT-30R) RV outlet as well as a 120V 30A locking outlet (L5-30R) and two 120V 20A household outlets (5-20R). Fill up the 3.8-gallon tank of gasoline, run at 50% and enjoy up to 12 hours of power. From 23 feet, the noise level is 68 dBA, about as loud as a vacuum cleaner. This unit has a low oil shut-off sensor and includes 0.6 quarts of 10W-30 engine oil so all you’ll need to buy is gasoline. This generator is EPA certified and CARB compliant. Buy with confidence - Champion Support and our nationwide network of service centers will back your purchase up with a 3-year limited warranty and FREE lifetime technical support.Gasoline Tank Material : Steel
feature_bullets: Wireless Remote Start – Start and stop with ease from up to 80 feet away with the included wireless remote key fob – push-button power and convenience like never before
Dimensions: 24.9" L x 22.9" W x 22.4" H | Weight: 120.1 lb

Electric Start – Trust the reliable 196cc Champion engine with its battery-included electric start featuring a 3-way ignition switch, plus built-in Cold Start Technology for easy starts in cold weather
Reliable and Powerful – At 4000 starting watts and 3500 running watts, enjoy up to 12 hours of run time on a full tank of gasoline with a noise level of 68 dBA from 23 feet

Outlets – 120V 30A locking, 120V 30A RV and two 120V 20A outlets- Volt Guard built-in surge protector prevents overloads and keeps your appliances and equipment safe.Frequency 60Hz. Engine Speed is 3600
Gasoline starting amps at 120 Volt : 33.3 Amps. Champion Support – includes 3-year limited warranty with FREE lifetime technical support from dedicated experts

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars557 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
